_description: Rhyming lines in Richard Rolle’s Meditations on the Passion, B Text — four lines

BodeMus232.Transcription:
to loue þe swete ihesuis most medeful moste
                    spedeful& most nedefulle
BodeMus232.Editions:
Allen,  Hope Emily. 
             English Writings of Richard Rolle.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1931: 30.

CULAdd3042.Transcription:
for to loue þee swete ihesumost needfulmoost
                    meedful& moost spedeful
CULAdd3042.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             Yorkshire Writers.
         2 vols. London, Sonnenschein; New York: Macmillan, 1895-96: 1.94.

UppsalaC494.Transcription:
To loue þee swete ihesuis most medefulmoste
                    spedeful& most nedeful
UppsalaC494.Editions:
Lindkvist,  Harald. 
             Richard Rolle’s Meditatio de passione Domini according to
                ms.
Skrifter utgifna af Humanistika Veternskaps
         19. Uppsala: Akademiska bokhandeln, 1917.
